name: Sons of Anarchy by Black Crown - Robusto
brand: Sons of Anarchy by Black Crown
additionalNotes:
The Sons of Anarchy by Black Crown cigar is considered the official stogie of the hit TV show “Sons of Anarchy,” which ran on the FX cable network for seven seasons (from 2008 to 2017). The show focused on an outlaw motorcycle gang that was based in the fictional town of Charming, CA. The cigar features 
Sons of Anarchy by Black Crown Robusto cigars are smooth, medium-bodied premiums loaded with Cuban-seed Nicaraguan tobaccos, this beauty is masked by a seamless Ecuadorian Oscuro wrapper and is teeming with notes of cedar, leather, and spice.
